mapper.insert: insert into tbl_hospital (hid, h_address, h_day, h_price, h_time, pid, p_name, p_type, p_breed, p_phone, rid, eid) values (#{hid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hAddress,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{hTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pBreed,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{eid,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_hospital set h_address = #{hAddress,jdbcType=CHAR}, h_day = #{hDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, h_price = #{hPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, h_time = #{hTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_name = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_type = #{pType,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_breed = #{pBreed,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_phone = #{pPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rid = #{rid,jdbcType=CHAR}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=CHAR} where hid = #{hid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select hid, h_address, h_day, h_price, h_time, pid, p_name, p_type, p_breed, p_phone, rid, eid from tbl_hospital where hid = #{hid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select hid, h_address, h_day, h_price, h_time, pid, p_name, p_type, p_breed, p_phone, rid, eid from tbl_hospital

SELECT h.hid, d1.value h_address, h.h_day, h.h_price, h.h_time, p.p_user_name pid, h.p_name, d2.value p_type, d3.value p_breed, h.p_phone, h.rid, e.e_name eid FROM tbl_hospital h JOIN tbl_dic_value d1 ON d1.id=h.h_address JOIN tbl_dic_value d2 ON d2.id=h.p_type JOIN tbl_dic_value d3 ON d3.id=h.p_breed JOIN tbl_employee e ON e.eid=h.eid JOIN tbl_pet_owner p ON p.pid=h.pid
p.p_user_name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'
h.p_phone LIKE '%' #{phone} '%'
h.h_time>#{startDate}
#{endDate}>h.h_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_hospital(hid, h_address, h_day, h_price, h_time, pid, p_name, p_type, p_breed, p_phone, rid, eid) VALUES(#{hid},#{hAddress},#{hDay},#{hPrice},#{hTime},#{pid},#{pName},#{pType},#{pBreed},#{pPhone},#{rid},#{eid})
mapper.select: SELECT hid, h_address, h_day, h_price, h_time, pid, p_name, p_type, p_breed, p_phone, rid, eid FROM tbl_hospital WHERE hid=#{id}
